scripts.postinstall: copyfiles -f node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.mjs src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/pixi.js/dist/pixi.mjs.map src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/file-saver/dist/FileSaver.min.js src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/file-saver/dist/FileSaver.min.js.map src/ && copyfiles -f node_modules/tweakpane/dist/tweakpane.js src/
